post.author: Admin
post.title: Upcoming Performances
post.description: The Band has two performances coming up soon. Please remember to check Mr. Vitale’s website under Di
post.content:
The Band has two performances coming up soon. Please remember to check Mr. Vitale’s website under Director’s Notes and Performances for the most current information.

Parent Preview Night

When: Sun., August 17

Report at 5:45, 6-7 rehearsal/warm up, 7-8 performance at the stadium.

Wear the summer uniform (purple band polo, khaki pants, black belt, black socks and black marching shoes).  Please be sure that you have all the parts and that they fit properly at least a week before this event.

North Royalton Home Days Parade

When: Sunday, August 24

Step off for the parade is 3:00.  Please check Mr. Vitale’s website for report times, etc.

Wear the summer uniform (purple band polo, khaki pants, black belt, black socks and black marching shoes).
